perturbation.original_text: A. You shall give AIRSOPURE notice in writing of Your election to renew this Agreement at least 3 months prior to the expiration of the then-current term.
perturbation.changed_text: A. You shall give AIRSOPURE notice in writing of Your election to renew this Agreement at least 2 weeks prior to the expiration of the then-current term.
perturbation.explanation: Reducing the notification period for renewal to 2 weeks may violate state franchise laws that require longer notification periods to protect franchisees. Many states mandate a minimum of 30-90 days notice for renewal elections.
perturbation.contradicted_law: State Franchise Laws (e.g., California Franchise Relations Act)

perturbation.original_text: H. Comply with all federal, state and local health and safety laws, rules and standards applicable to operation of the Franchise. You will forward copies of all notices of non-compliance by the Franchise with any law, rule, regulation or ordinance to AIRSOPURE within three days from receipt thereof accompanied by a summary of action You will take to comply.
perturbation.changed_text: H. Comply with all federal, state and local health and safety laws, rules and standards applicable to operation of the Franchise. You will forward copies of all notices of non-compliance by the Franchise with any law, rule, regulation or ordinance to AIRSOPURE within one day from receipt thereof accompanied by a summary of action You will take to comply.
perturbation.explanation: Reducing the notification period for non-compliance to one day may violate state laws that require a minimum timeframe to inform the other party. Some states mandate a minimum of 3 to 5 days to inform another party

perturbation.original_text:
12.03.   Right of First Refusal

In the event You desire to sell the AIRSOPURE Center and Franchise rights and license granted herein, or any part of Your stock interest in a corporation that has been granted such rights, and receives a bona fide acceptable offer in writing, You agree to notify AIRSOPURE in writing of the terms and conditions of such offer. AIRSOPURE shall have the option, within 15 days after receipt of such written notice, to notify You that AIRSOPURE elects to purchase the rights and license granted herein or stock ownership on the same terms and conditions as the bona fide written offer.
perturbation.changed_text:
12.03.   Right of First Refusal

In the event You desire to sell the AIRSOPURE Center and Franchise rights and license granted herein, or any part of Your stock interest in a corporation that has been granted such rights, and receives a bona fide acceptable offer in writing, You agree to notify AIRSOPURE in writing of the terms and conditions of such offer. AIRSOPURE shall have the option, within 5 days after receipt of such written notice, to notify You that AIRSOPURE elects to purchase the rights and license granted herein or stock ownership on the same terms and conditions as the bona fide written offer.
perturbation.explanation: Reducing the period to exercise the right of first refusal to 5 days may conflict with franchise laws, which often mandate a reasonable period to review the offer and exercise the right, usually 30 days.
